title:SpaceMonkey's Weapon Guide - Festival of the Lost 2025
description:https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KGxePntz2loCYlAhdKm0fJyyf_YURJ1Zd7L1smsu4-c/edit?usp=sharing

// Gunburn (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "This looks great on paper. The archetype is fantastic and there are a plethora of good perks here. The bad news is that it basically doesn't have an origin trait for PvE, and it doesn't get Attrition Orbs paired with Kinetic Tremors, so it will never be as good as Multimach. Attrition Orbs paired with Bewildering Burst is pretty cool, but sadly relies on getting a kill first, which means that it doesn't have enough “out of the box” play. That being said, of the 3 weapons this one is definitely the winner." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,god-pve
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=1840239774,3230963543,2289534249,243981275
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=1840239774,3230963543,2289534249,1202584452
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=1840239774,3230963543,2289534249,3891536761
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2289534249,243981275
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2289534249,1202584452
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2289534249,3891536761

// Gunburn (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "This looks great on paper. The archetype is fantastic and there are a plethora of good perks here. The bad news is that it basically doesn't have an origin trait for PvE, and it doesn't get Attrition Orbs paired with Kinetic Tremors, so it will never be as good as Multimach. Attrition Orbs paired with Bewildering Burst is pretty cool, but sadly relies on getting a kill first, which means that it doesn't have enough “out of the box” play. That being said, of the 3 weapons this one is definitely the winner." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,god-pve
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=1840239774,3230963543,2289534249,243981275
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=1840239774,3230963543,2289534249,1202584452
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=1840239774,3230963543,2289534249,3891536761
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2289534249,243981275
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2289534249,1202584452
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2289534249,3891536761

// Gunburn (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE): "This looks great on paper. The archetype is fantastic and there are a plethora of good perks here. The bad news is that it basically doesn't have an origin trait for PvE, and it doesn't get Attrition Orbs paired with Kinetic Tremors, so it will never be as good as Multimach. Attrition Orbs paired with Bewildering Burst is pretty cool, but sadly relies on getting a kill first, which means that it doesn't have enough “out of the box” play. That being said, of the 3 weapons this one is definitely the winner." Recommended MW: Reload, Range.|tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=1840239774,3230963543,1570399071,243981275

dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=839105230,3142289711,4071163871,3891536761

// Gunburn (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE): "This looks great on paper. The archetype is fantastic and there are a plethora of good perks here. The bad news is that it basically doesn't have an origin trait for PvE, and it doesn't get Attrition Orbs paired with Kinetic Tremors, so it will never be as good as Multimach. Attrition Orbs paired with Bewildering Burst is pretty cool, but sadly relies on getting a kill first, which means that it doesn't have enough “out of the box” play. That being said, of the 3 weapons this one is definitely the winner." Recommended MW: Reload, Range.|tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=1840239774,3230963543,1570399071,243981275
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=1840239774,3230963543,1570399071,1202584452

// Gunburn (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvP / God-PvP): "This looks great on paper. The archetype is fantastic and there are a plethora of good perks here. The bad news is that it basically doesn't have an origin trait for PvE, and it doesn't get Attrition Orbs paired with Kinetic Tremors, so it will never be as good as Multimach. Attrition Orbs paired with Bewildering Burst is pretty cool, but sadly relies on getting a kill first, which means that it doesn't have enough “out of the box” play. That being said, of the 3 weapons this one is definitely the winner." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2289534249,365154968
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2579169598,365154968

// Gunburn (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvP / God-PvP): "This looks great on paper. The archetype is fantastic and there are a plethora of good perks here. The bad news is that it basically doesn't have an origin trait for PvE, and it doesn't get Attrition Orbs paired with Kinetic Tremors, so it will never be as good as Multimach. Attrition Orbs paired with Bewildering Burst is pretty cool, but sadly relies on getting a kill first, which means that it doesn't have enough “out of the box” play. That being said, of the 3 weapons this one is definitely the winner." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2289534249,365154968
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=3250034553,3142289711,2579169598,365154968

// Gunburn (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvP / God-PvP): "This looks great on paper. The archetype is fantastic and there are a plethora of good perks here. The bad news is that it basically doesn't have an origin trait for PvE, and it doesn't get Attrition Orbs paired with Kinetic Tremors, so it will never be as good as Multimach. Attrition Orbs paired with Bewildering Burst is pretty cool, but sadly relies on getting a kill first, which means that it doesn't have enough “out of the box” play. That being said, of the 3 weapons this one is definitely the winner." Recommended MW: Range, Handling, Stability.|tags:pvp,god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=72775246&perks=4090651448,3142289711,2289534249,365154968

// Gunburn (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvP / God-PvP): "This looks great on paper. The archetype is fantastic and there are a plethora of good perks here. The bad news is that it basically doesn't have an origin trait for PvE, and it doesn't get Attrition Orbs paired with Kinetic Tremors, so it will never be as good as Multimach. Attrition Orbs paired with Bewildering Burst is pretty cool, but sadly relies on getting a kill first, which means that it doesn't have enough “out of the box” play. That being said, of the 3 weapons this one is definitely the winner." Recommended MW: Range, Handling, Stability.|tags:pvp,god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=3431536253&perks=4090651448,3142289711,2289534249,365154968

// Hushed Whisper (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE): "Pretty underwhelming. This has the same issue that all strand primaries have, where the perks they have access to are just not very good. And like all bows you need a very good roll in order for it to feel at all okay at a baseline. The one benefit is that it does have access to Wild Card, which is not a bad origin trait for PvE. The ammo gen stat here is terrible though, so this probably becomes straight up useless." Recommended MW: Draw Time, Accuracy.|tags:pve

//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE): "Pretty underwhelming. This has the same issue that all strand primaries have, where the perks they have access to are just not very good. And like all bows you need a very good roll in order for it to feel at all okay at a baseline. The one benefit is that it does have access to Wild Card, which is not a bad origin trait for PvE. The ammo gen stat here is terrible though, so this probably becomes straight up useless." Recommended MW: Draw Time, Accuracy.|tags:pve

// Arcane Embrace (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "One of the random, weird new shotgun archetypes that someone at bungie keeps trying to make happen. The base gun is pretty useless, but the perk combos it can get aren't bad. If Bungie ever decides to buff this archetype then we could be looking at a legitimate dps threat." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,god-pve
dimwishlist:item=3328019216&perks=1840239774,106909392,1354429876,3764420437

// Arcane Embrace (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE / God-PvE): "One of the random, weird new shotgun archetypes that someone at bungie keeps trying to make happen. Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,god-pve

// Arcane Embrace (Season 27)
//notes:SpaceMonkey (PvE): "One of the random, weird new shotgun archetypes that someone at bungie keeps trying to make happen. The base gun is pretty useless, but the perk combos it can get aren't bad. If Bungie ever decides to buff this archetype then we could be looking at a legitimate dps threat." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve
